statements: SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE year_created >= 2000;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price, material FROM sculptures WHERE material='Marble';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM sculptures ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) as total_sculptures FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_sculptures > 1
SELECT sculpture_name, material, inventory_count FROM sculptures WHERE material = 'Marble' OR material = 'Bronze'
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM sculptures WHERE year_created BETWEEN 2005 AND 2010
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE material='marble';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, date_of_creation FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name='Leonardo da Vinci' AND date_of_creation >='1500-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE price_paid >= 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material, date_of_creation FROM sculptures WHERE material='Marble' ORDER BY date_of_creation ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method='Credit Card' AND price_paid > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price, material FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name='Leonardo Da Vinci' AND price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;

SELECT sculpture_name, date_of_creation, price_paid, payment_method FROM sculptures s JOIN transactions t ON s.sculpture_id = t.sculpture_id WHERE date_of_creation >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_creation ASC, price_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE price > 500;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Pablo%' ORDER BY sculpture_name ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price, amount_paid FROM sculptures JOIN transactions ON sculptures.sculpture_id = transactions.sculpture_id WHERE amount_paid > 5000;
SELECT s.sculpture_name, i.quantity FROM sculptures s JOIN inventory i ON s.sculpture_id = i.sculpture_id WHERE i.quantity < 10 ORDER BY i.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM Sculptures WHERE inventory_count > 0;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists ORDER BY nationality ASC;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM Galleries WHERE gallery_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM Sculptures WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM Sculptures WHERE inventory_count > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality, style FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT gallery_name, location, contact_number FROM Galleries WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY gallery_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM Transactions WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sculpture;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, price FROM Sculpture ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM Gallery WHERE location='New York';
SELECT sculpture_name, material FROM Sculpture WHERE material='Bronze' AND price > 1000;
SELECT fair_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM ArtFair ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material, price FROM Sculpture WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM Gallery WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material, price FROM Sculpture WHERE material = 'Bronze' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material, price, sale_price, sale_date FROM Sculpture INNER JOIN Transaction ON Sculpture.sculpture_id = Transaction.sculpture_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT gallery_name, location, quantity, last_updated FROM Gallery INNER JOIN Inventory ON Gallery.gallery_id = Inventory.sculpture_id ORDER BY last_updated DESC
